entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Baie-Saint-Paul
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 78 %

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
